TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewComboBoxColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn

span.span: Represents a column of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是特殊的类型的用于逻辑主机使用户能够从选项列表中选择值的单元。The class is a specialized type of used to logically host cells that enable users to select values from a list of choices. A都有一个相关中每个与其相交。A has an associated in every that intersects it. 你可以通过设置手动填充单元格其属性。You can populate the cells manually by setting their properties. 或者，你可以将列绑定到数据源由属性。Alternatively, you can bind the column to the data source indicated by the property. 如果是绑定到数据库表，请将此列设置属性表中的列的名称。If the is bound to a database table, set the column property to the name of a column in the table. 如果是绑定到的对象的集合，请将对象属性的名称的属性。If the is bound to a collection of objects, set the property to the name of an object property. 您可以通过将值添加到手动填充列的下拉列表集合。You can populate the column drop-down list manually by adding values to the collection. 或者，通过设置列，其自己的数据源绑定下拉列表属性。Alternatively, you can bind the drop-down list to its own data source by setting the column property. 如果这些值是集合中的对象或数据库表中的记录，还必须设置和属性。If the values are objects in a collection or records in a database table, you must also set the and properties. 属性指示哪个对象属性或数据库列提供下拉列表中显示的值。The property indicates which object property or database column provides the values that are displayed in the drop-down list. 属性指示哪个对象属性或数据库列用于设置单元格属性。The property indicates which object property or database column is used to set the cell property. 一个典型方案是将绑定到父数据库表控件以及如何绑定到相关的子表的下拉列表。One typical scenario is to bind the control to a parent database table and bind the drop-down list to a related child table. 例如，你可能绑定控制转移到`Orders`包含表`ProductID`列和列组属性`Products`包含表`ProductID`和`ProductName`列。For example, you might bind the control to an `Orders` table that contains a `ProductID` column and set the column property to a `Products` table that contains `ProductID` and `ProductName` columns. 在这种情况下，会将列设置属性设置为"ProductID"来填充它单元格的值从`Orders.ProductID`列。In this case, you would set the column property to "ProductID" to populate its cell values from the `Orders.ProductID` column. 但是，若要在单元格和下拉列表中显示实际的产品名称，将映射到这些值`Products`通过设置表"ProductID"的属性和为"产品名称"的属性。However, to display the actual product names in the cells and the drop-down list, you would map these values to the `Products` table by setting the property to "ProductID" and the property to "ProductName". 下拉列表值 (或值由属性) 必须包含实际的单元值或控件将引发异常。The drop-down list values (or the values indicated by the property) must include the actual cell values or the control will throw an exception. 将列设置， ，和属性自动设置所有单元格的相应属性以列包括。Setting the column , , and properties automatically sets the corresponding properties of all cells in the column including the . 若要覆盖特定单元格这些属性值，首先，设置的列属性，然后设置的单元属性。To override these property values for specific cells, set the column property first, and then set the cell properties. 与不同控件，没有和属性。Unlike the control, the does not have and properties. 相反，从下拉列表中选择一个值设置的单元格属性。Instead, selecting a value from a drop-down list sets the cell property. 此列类型的默认排序模式是。The default sort mode for this column type is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来帮助进行数据输入到`TitleOfCourtesy`列。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in entering data into the `TitleOfCourtesy` column. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#0)]

span.para: 派生自并将新属性添加到派生的类，请确保重写方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。你还应调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格。

When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations. You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether cells in the column will match the characters being entered in the cell with one from the possible selections.

value.span: 如果自动完成已激活，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if auto completion is activated; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置的列中每个单元格的属性。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于创建单元格的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template used to create cells.

value.span: 一个 ，列中的所有其他单元格都以它为模型。

span.span: A that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
The default value is a new .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数类初始化该属性为新创建。The constructor for the class initializes this property to a newly created . > [!CAUTION] > 更改单元格模板的属性不会立即影响列的现有单元格的用户的界面 (UI)。Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells. 重新生成列后，这些更改才明显 (例如，通过对列进行排序或通过调用方法)。These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the method). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性，它是类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 操作 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#120)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以复制的单元格一列。Use this method to duplicate a column of cells.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ DataSource { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.DataSource : obj with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置填充组合框的选项的数据源。

span.span: Gets or sets the data source that populates the selections for the combo boxes.
An object that represents a data source.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 或属性指定要从中检索组合框下拉列表中显示的选择数据。The or properties specify where to retrieve the selection data shown in the combo box drop-down list. 使用时属性，如果必须从非默认属性或列中，绘制数据则属性必须设置为非默认属性或列的名称。When using the property, if the data must be drawn from a nondefault property or column, then the property must be set to the name of the nondefault property or column. 如果属性设置为一个字符串数组，然后和不需要因为数组中的每个字符串将用于值和显示设置。If the property is set to a string array, then and do not need to be set because each string in the array will be used for both value and display. 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来帮助进行数据输入到`TitleOfCourtesy`列。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in entering data into the `TitleOfCourtesy` column. 属性用于通过选择标题在组合框中填充。The property is used to populate the combo box with a selection of titles. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#40)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，此字符串指定要从其中检索在组合框中显示的字符串的属性或列。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that specifies the property or column from which to retrieve strings for display in the combo boxes.

value.span: ，它指定在 属性中所指定数据源中的属性或列的名称。

span.span: A that specifies the name of a property or column in the data source specified in the property.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的列存储的值的数据从获取对象。The data for the values stored in a column of objects is obtained from the . 如果此数据来自非默认属性或列，则属性必须设置为必需属性名称或列名称。If this data comes from a nondefault property or column, then the property must be set to the necessary property name or column name. 如果单元格的值对用户不可见的内部值，然后使用和将内部单元格值映射到用户可以查看的值。If the cell values are internal values not visible to the user, then use and to map the internal cell values to user-viewable values. 当属性设置为一个字符串数组，属性不需要设置，因为将使用每个字符串数组中的，为有效的显示字符串和有效的基础值。When the property is set to a string array, the property does not need to be set because each string in the array will be used as a valid display string and as a valid underlying value. 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用以帮助中的标题列的数据输入。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in data entry of the title column. 设置为负责包含用户可查看的文本的属性名称。 is set to the property name responsible for containing the user-viewable text. 在此示例中，设置为相同的值因为没有映射是必需的。In this example, the is set to the same value as because no mapping is necessary. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#40)]

span.span: The value of the property is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle DisplayStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定没有编辑时组合框的显示方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how the combo box is displayed when not editing.

value.span: 值，它指示组合框的外观。

span.span: A value indicating the combo box appearance.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性会影响列中的单元格的外观，当它们处于未处于编辑模式，并且无论是只读的。The property affects the appearance of cells in the column when they are not in edit mode, and regardless of whether they are read-only. 当单元格处于编辑模式时，它始终如下所示控件。When a cell is in edit mode, it always looks like a control. 如果属性值是`false`、属性会影响所有列单元格中; 否则为属性会都影响仅对当前单元格。If the property value is `false`, the property affects all cells in the column; otherwise, the property affects only the current cell. 行为和外观的单元格中的下拉箭头将由属性。The behavior and appearance of the drop-down arrow in the cells is indicated by the property. 若要启用单元格突出显示当鼠标指针在单元格时，必须设置属性和属性。To enable cell highlighting when the mouse pointer is over a cell, you must set the property to and the property to . 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.

span.span: The value of the property is .

span.span: if the display style applies only to the current cell; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性值是`false`、属性会影响所有列单元格中; 否则为属性会都影响仅对当前单元格。If the property value is `false`, the property affects all cells in the column; otherwise, the property affects only the current cell. 属性会影响列中的单元格的外观，当它们处于未处于编辑模式，并且无论是只读的。The property affects the appearance of cells in the column when they are not in edit mode, and regardless of whether they are read-only. 当单元格处于编辑模式时，它始终如下所示控件。When a cell is in edit mode, it always looks like a control. 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.

The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性对应于属性成员。This property corresponds to the property of the member. 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置的列中每个单元格的属性。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来帮助进行数据输入到`TitleOfCourtesy`列。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in entering data into the `TitleOfCourtesy` column. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性会影响的行为和外观此列中的单元格的下拉箭头。The property affects the behavior and appearance of the drop-down arrows for the cells in this column. 从.NET Framework 4.6，开始时属性设置为`Flat`或`Popup`下拉箭头调整根据系统 DPI 设置 app.config 文件包含以下条目：Starting with the .NET Framework 4.6, when the property is set to `Flat` or `Popup` the drop-down arrows are resized according to the system DPI settings when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ``` 若要启用单元格突出显示当鼠标指针在单元格时，必须设置属性和属性。To enable cell highlighting when the mouse pointer is over a cell, you must set the property to and the property to . 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来帮助进行数据输入到`TitleOfCourtesy`列。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in entering data into the `TitleOfCourtesy` column. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#40)]

summary.span: 获取用作组合框中选项的对象的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of objects used as selections in the combo boxes.
An that represents the selections in the combo boxes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的值属性返回属性。This property returns the value of the property of the returned by the property. 或属性用于填充组合框的选择。The or properties are used to populate the selections of the combo boxes. 如果字符串添加到，则和属性不需要由于添加每个字符串将用于值和显示设置。If strings are added to , then the and properties do not need to be set because each string added will be used for both value and display. > [!NOTE] > 不支持多个具有相同的显示值项使用。 does not support the use of multiple items with identical display values. 如果设置属性，则不能使用。If the property is set, then cannot be used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来帮助进行数据输入到`TitleOfCourtesy`列。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in entering data into the `TitleOfCourtesy` column. 属性用于填充组合框下拉列表，通过选择标题。The property is used to populate the combo box drop-down list with a selection of titles. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. summary.span: 获取或设置列的单元格中下拉列表的最大项数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of items in the drop-down list of the cells in the column.

value.span: 下拉列表的最大项数，范围从 1 到 100。

span.span: The maximum number of drop-down list items, from 1 to 100.
The default is 8.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置的列中每个单元格的属性。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来帮助进行数据输入到`TitleOfCourtesy`列。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in entering data into the `TitleOfCourtesy` column. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置的列中每个单元格的属性。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来帮助进行数据输入到`TitleOfCourtesy`列。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in entering data into the `TitleOfCourtesy` column. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，此字符串指定要从其中获取与下拉列表的选项对应的值的属性或列。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that specifies the property or column from which to get values that correspond to the selections in the drop-down list.

value.span: ，它指定在 属性中使用的属性或列的名称。

span.span: A that specifies the name of a property or column used in the property.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅有关其关系的详细信息。See for more information about its relationship with . 当属性设置为一个字符串数组，属性不需要设置，因为将使用每个字符串数组中的，为有效的显示字符串和有效的基础值。When the property is set to a string array, the property does not need to be set because each string in the array will be used as a valid display string and as a valid underlying value. 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来帮助进行数据输入到`TitleOfCourtesy`列。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in entering data into the `TitleOfCourtesy` column. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic.
